Articles.Content:
I've been playing KSP for about a week now. Its amazing by the way! Such a complex game But I'd like to announce that I just made my 3rd Mun Landing and 1st Return from Mun mission. Got a little clip of me dancing around my ship from the other day as well.

Getting off topic here though. I just wanted to say Hi, and ask for tips on how to start to get to Minmus

Hi nlosee18, welcome to the community

Congrats on your Mun missions, getting to Minmus is not much harder, just take a look in the map to see where Minmus's orbit is in relation to Kerbin and try to angle your orbit to match it, you can do this while launching if you are careful.

Minmus is on a 4 degree tilt and you can tilt your own orbit if you thrust directly "up" or "down", you can switch the camera to Orbital mode with V and look at Kerbin to work this out, or you can use the navball.
